item.description:
Join the Boston San Francisco Crew (BSFC) Meetup Group in cheering on the SF Giants at The North Star TOMORROW night!  The game starts at 8:00pm.  Jeff has kindly offered to reserve tables/space for our group.  While we will not have sound, the game will definitely be on.  There is no cover charge and you can come and go as you like. Come on by and say hi!  The BSFC group will also be joining the RSN's for the Patriots/49ers game in mid-December. Please welcome them to the fun!

 

The North Star is conveniently located near North Station (Orange and Green Lines, Commuter Rail). Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO!

 

I'm actually still in St. Louis but Meredith should be there will several other SF Giants fans.

THanks much!  Isabel
item.how_to_find_us: Meredith from Boston San Francisco Crew will be there. Ask hostess for MeetUP group
item.name: NLCS SF Giants @ St. Louis Cardinals GAME 5 Playoff at The North Star
